vsthespire:mirrorshard.NAME: Mirror Shard
vsthespire:mirrorshard.FLAVOR: A Mysterious shard of a broken mirror. Holding it fills you with an unnatural vitality.
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, add a #rDecay to your deck and heal to #b50% of your Max HP instead (works once per combat). When fighting your rival, heal to your Max HP and flee the current combat instead.
